Dr. Harry J. Skornia, President

lk Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
March 16 would be a good day for you and Bill Harley to visit
with us in Battle Creek. Dr. Morris and I are reserving as much
of the day as you care to use.
Sincerely and with best wishes
Maurice F. Seay
MFS:jf
cc: Dr. William Harley
